FuncDef: This command allows private AS numbers to be removed from the AS path before advertising them to BGP peers.

ParaDef.Info: This optional keyword removes private ASNs up to the first public ASN encountered. It then stops removing private ASNs.
This optional keyword causes this command to not remove a private ASN from the AS-Path if that ASN is the same as the BGP peer AS number.

ExtraInfo: Default: no remove-private - Private AS numbers will be included in the AS path attribute.
